name: Sour Sam
description:
Sour Sam

You're a bored hacker stuck in his room in lockdown. Your neighbour Sam is a grumpy guy and you love messing with him. His wife is travelling for work and you just hacked her email account. Not only that, but you've hacked Sam's smart home as well.

Get Sam busy doing tasks around the house by sending emails from his wife's account. Use items in his smart home to distract him.

Ruin Sam's day...because why not?
